text: Bernardo de Souza Oliveira (born June 8, 1993) is a Brazilian athlete who competes in recurve archery. He was one of the most successful athletes in the Brazilian team at the 2010 South American Games, in Medellin, Colombia, winning six medals total, 4 gold, one silver and one bronze.R7 Jogos de Medellín abrem espaço para atletas brasileiros menos conhecidos. title: Bernardo Oliveira
